title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.

title: [PR] Add secure deployment infrastructure and documentation, address exposed credentials
summary: The issue requested deployment scripts for a cloud AI platform but contained exposed API keys (Azure OpenAI, xAI Grok, OpenAI), server credentials, and database passwords in plain text. Rather than implement scripts with hardcoded secrets, provided secure deployment infrastructure using environment

title: [PR] Add optional GPU acceleration for Ollama local LLM inference
summary:
Ollama currently runs CPU-only. Users with NVIDIA GPUs can achieve 10-100x faster inference but had no straightforward way to enable GPU support.

## Changes

- Added commented GPU deploy section to `ollama` service using NVIDIA Container Toolkit

title: [PR] Feature/web next perf
summary:
# ZADANIE 057: Monitoring backendu LLM (Ollama vs vLLM)

## Kontekst
- Venom działa jednocześnie z dwoma serwerami LLM: Ollama (`phi3:mini`) i vLLM (`models/gemma-3-4b-it`).
- Panel `/api/v1/models` pokazuje listę lokalnych modeli, ale brak informacji w UI/logach, który serwer i konkretny model
